name: Leart
description:
Take part in this short adventure based on the tale The Tell-Tale Heart by Edgar Allan Poe

Control
[W][A][S][D] to move
[E] to interact with scenery and objects
[E] to advance the dialogue
[LEFT CLICK] only in the puzzle window that opens

Spoiler: You should start with the art board.

Art and Programming by : clown az (leto ffreitas)
Sound by : Creative CC
